title: What are the pros and cons of having a bigger TV? - Quora

response.answer_text: Bigger is definitely better, and more so in case of TV. Even more true if you are watching movies. No TV is big enough when it comes to movies. That is why many enthusiasts go for an HT room with projector, etc. Soap operas and TV dramas? Not so much - TV size is not really important here. Cons? The cost I suppose.
